Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Elaine Harger and John Bennett Collection on the Harry Van Arsdale Jr. School of Labor Studies
Harger, Elaine
Harger, Elaine
WAG.143
3 Linear Feet (3 boxes)
undated Materials are in English 1 2 3
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Elaine Harger were transferred to New York University in 1996 by Elaine Harger. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu, (212) 998-2630.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Elaine Harger in 1996. The accession number 1996.019 is associated with this gift.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Elaine Harger and John Bennett Collection on the Harry Van Arsdale Jr. School of Labor Studies; TAM 143; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Scope and Content Note
This collection contains materials pertaining to Harry Van Arsdale Jr. School of Labor Studies at Empire State College, including the earliest years of the College, as well as the library. Also included are materials from the United University Professions-American Federation of Teachers and labor organizing at the school during the 1990s. There are also copies of the student newspaper, P.U.L.P.
Historical/Biographical Note
Elaine Harger was a librarian at the Harry Van Arsdale School of Labor Studies at Empre State College-SUNY and the union representative to the United University Professions-American Federation of Teachers from 1989 to 1995.
Harger, Elaine Empire State College
